Trade/Device Name(s): Dimension® Urine Ecstasy Screen Flex® reagent cartridge
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Dimension® Urine Ecstasy Screen Flex® reagent cartridge for qualitative and semi-quantitative determination of MDMA and related drugs in urine on the Dimension® clinical chemistry system
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative and semi-quantitative determination of MDMA and closely related drugs in human urine using cutoffs of 300 or 500 ng/mL to aid in diagnosis and treatment of ecstasy use or overdose; provides preliminary results, confirmatory testing recommended
